description:
Joseph used to be a young gravedigger who lost his parents at a young age. The village he resided in suffered from a famine. He was blamed and beaten, but couldn`t leave since he had to take care of Cartaphilus.
After they merged, http://anidb.net/ch91215 [Joseph] spent centuries searching for the reason of his curse and to find a way to break it. He committed many horrible acts in order to stave off his body constantly rotting and being in constant pain, until he lost the ability to feel empathy.
Source: Mahou Tsukai no Yome Wiki
name: Joseph
